actions.message:
Hey, ${member}, you used $help on Ex Server.
So, there are the commands anyone can use.
```
$hi (The bot says "Hi")
$bye (The bot says "Goodbye")
$help (Opens this help box.)
$enable_qotd (Allows you to get pinged when a QOTD is made.)
$disable_qotd (QOTD no longer pings you.)
$staff_members (List of staff members.)
$level_ranks (Rank obtainable by Mee6)
$facts (4 random facts.)
$whois_ex (Some random info about Ex.)
$whois_accord (Some random info about Accord.)
$foundallsecrets (If you have all the 8 secrets, claim your Secret Finder role!)
```
That's all the commands.
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message:
Hey, ${member}, you used $staffhelp on Ex Server.
So, there are the staff only commands.
```
$botsay [#channel] [text] (Make the bot say something.)
$boot [user] (Kick a user.)
$banhammer [user] (Ban a user)
$userinfo [user] (Obtain some info about the user you mentioned.)
$serverinfo (Obtain info about the server.)
$warn [user] [reason] (Warns a user.)
$mute [user] (Mutes a user.)
$unmute [user] (Unmutes a user.)
```
That's all the commands.

actions.message:
There are the ranks you can obtain through mee6.
**Bronze:** Reach level 1, easy enough.
**Silver:** Reach level 5, the xp curve gets higher.
**Gold:** Reach level 10, this takes a lot of time.
**Platinum:** Reach level 15, you are wasting your life.
**Star:** Reach level 20, a shiny star, but you lost days or even weeks.
**Diamond:** Reach level 25, a diamond, so shiny that is worth it. (I guess)
**Master:** Reach level 30, give up.

actions.message:
Want to know information about **Ex**? Okay.
```
Ex is a builder and scripter on roblox, but underrated.
Ex is masochist. (He likes pain, and this includes his obby.)
Ex and Accord are a cute pair. (Kinda)
Ex owns the Platinum Rank.
Addict of Construct 2 and RPG Maker MV.
He likes spaghetti.
````
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message:
Want to know information about **Ms. Accord**? Okay.
```
Ms. Accord originates from Puyo Puyo.
She and Ex are a pair. (Puyo Puyo Tetris, chapter 10-9)
And that's all, she keeps some information that is private.
````
